titleStmt.title: Holy obseruations. Lib. 1. Also some fewe of Dauids Psalmes metaphrased, for a taste of the rest. By Ios. Hall
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Samuel Macham: and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: "Some fewe of Dauids Psalms metaphrased, for a taste of the rest", unpaginated, has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
The last leaf is blank except for marginal rules.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
